message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This is a good deal for both of us.
I understand you want a larger share Alice, how about we meet closer to the middle?
I'm willing to compromise, but time is running out and the value is decreasing. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is a fair deal considering the time pressure and the decreasing value. Let's close this out.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if this keeps up. Meet me in the middle or the next offer will be much lower.
Alice, this is it.  A 50/50 split is the only fair offer at this point. Take it or leave it.
